title: "Annabelle A Effective Teamwork"
format: html
---

article link: https://hr.berkeley.edu/hr-network/central-guide-managing-hr/managing-hr/interaction/team-building/steps 

Summary: Effective teamwork is reliant on every member of the team being treated with respect and being listened to. When team members are valued for their specific skills and given clear communication, they are most successful. It's also crucial that team members feel aligned with the overall goals of the team. Lastly, clear boundaries should be established in order to minimize conflict and maximize successful collaboration.
